column5: looks like I need to put a piston in a 150 intruder and the guy  I had lined up to do it stood me up for the second time. don't have time or the space to do it myself and have no idea who does this work around here.

You could try Sanders Mechanical. 657-2090. RR 1 Lakefield, Buckhorn Peterborough. I blew a cylinder while I was staying on Lower Buckhorn lake several years ago. They installed a new powerhead for me fairly quickly. I don't know if they would do rebuilds this time of year or not, but they seem honest and do good work. The owners of the resort that we always stay at trust them.  Tom
I get all my outboard work done at McLarens Marine on #35, just south of HB cycle. They've always treated me very well, and get things fixed fast.  S.
Ernie,  His name is Roy Lewis at Lewis Enterprises. Certified Evinrude Genius. Located just outside of Stouffville.
Make sure that the problem that cause the piston to blow is fixed as well. Carb, reeds, oil injector etc.
thanks, i'am  pretty sure you dealt with the same guy up in my area, and i'll never use him again
The only other guy that I would use is Paul at Top Gun. He know his stuff too.  Used a guy in Newmarket once... won't make that mistake again.
Except for the drive try Hastings Marine, Hastings Ont.  20 min east of Peter. Good people.
Tosh's Marine on 36 just before nogies creek..chris macintosh is his name. The number escapes me
Ernie...send Nanook (Jack) a PM...he worked part-time cleaning boats for a chap in Buckhorn, Ont...not too far a drive from you...
